---
name: text-with-tools
text_config:
  model_name: test-model
  tools:
    sum:
      description: Add two numbers
      parameters:
        type: object
        properties:
          a:
            type: number
          b:
            type: number
        required: ["a", "b"]
input_schema:
  type: object
  properties:
    userMessage:
      type: string
  required:
    - userMessage
---

<User>
{props.userMessage}
</User>
